info.name: 革Project#3 - restful-booker
info.description: The goal of this Project is to ensure the quality,functionality, and reliability of the Restful Booker API hosted at [https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/).The API is designed to handle booking requests for a fictional hotel booking system.

item.name: Auth Verification
TC#1Auth with valid credentials

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 1500ms", function () {
pm.test("Response body has token property", function () {

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST \
  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "username" : "admin",
    "password" : "password123"
}'

item.description:
Note 1 - Here in this folder added the Auth specific Request and test case are wriiten down with the helkp of AI postbot in postman  
Note 2 - Here we have created the Global variable and passed the global variable for this Auth folder only global variable can be used everywhere

Steps to create Global variable->

1.Navigate to Environment

2.Click on Global Option and pass the URL(Base URL) in initial value.

Note 1 - Get Booking request is fopr fetching all the booking available

Note 2 - here we have used the collection variables this is used for collction level only and passed this in the request URL in {{url}}  
steps to create the collection Variables

1.click on collection

2.Then click on variable option in parallel window  
3.Provide name and initial value (Base URL)

    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}'

item.name: 猬锔UpdateBooking
TC#27猬锔Auth Required - Booking - UpdateBooking

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X PUT \
  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1 \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Cookie: token=abc123' \
  -d '{
    "firstname" : "James",
    "lastname" : "Brown",
    "totalprice" : 111,
    "depositpaid" : true,
    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2018-01-01",
